pr_title: Make the IntervalMetricReader robust to exporter failures

timeline.message: If an exporter throws an exception, log it, rather than having the IMR stop altogether.

timeline.bodyText: Do we need this section to be in this try block too?
timeline.author: carlosalberto

replies.bodyText: Perhaps not, but if anything in here fails, we don't want the IMR to die, so it felt safer just to put everything in the block.
replies.author: jkwatson
